unnormalised: Due to the ongoing monsoon, several trains are running late, said officials at NDLS. The Howrah Rajdhani Exp, scheduled to arrive at 10:00 AM, is delayed by 2 hrs. Similarly, the Mumbai local that usually leaves Dadar at 5:30 PM, is expected to depart around 7 PM.
normalised: Due to the ongoing monsoon, several trains are running late, said officials at N-D-L-S. The Howrah Rajdhani E-x-p, scheduled to arrive at ten A-M, is delayed by two hours. Similarly, the Mumbai local that usually leaves Dadar at five thirty P-M, is expected to depart around seven P-M.

unnormalised: Indigo flight 6E202 from Delhi to Bangalore, which was to take off at 0630 hrs, has been rescheduled to 0800 hrs due to bad weather in BLR. Passengers are advised to check their flight status online or call the airline for updates.
normalised: Indigo flight six E two zero two from Delhi to Bangalore, which was to take off at zero six thirty hours, has been rescheduled to zero eight zero zero hours due to bad weather in B-L-R. Passengers are advised to check their flight status online or call the airline for updates.

unnormalised: Road travel is also impacted. The Delhi-Jaipur highway is experiencing heavy traffic, with delays of up to 1 hour 30 mins expected. Travel time from Gurgaon to Jaipur is estimated to be around 6 hrs instead of the usual 4:30 hrs.
normalised: Road travel is also impacted. The Delhi-Jaipur highway is experiencing heavy traffic, with delays of up to one hour thirty minutes expected. Travel time from Gurgaon to Jaipur is estimated to be around six hours instead of the usual four hours thirty minutes.

unnormalised: The situation is being closely monitored, and updates will be provided by 1400 hrs. Commuters are requested to factor in these delays while planning their journeys.
normalised: The situation is being closely monitored, and updates will be provided by fourteen hundred hours. Commuters are requested to factor in these delays while planning their journeys.
